subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Infante, the N.F.L.’s coach of the year in 1989 with Green Bay, was also the victim of bad timing, losing both his head-coaching jobs in the seasons before his teams obtained superstars.
snippet: Infante, the N.F.L.’s coach of the year in 1989 with Green Bay, was also the victim of bad timing, losing both his head-coaching jobs in the seasons before his teams obtained superstars.
